lead_paragraph: It is possible that there have never been quarterbacks as different in their approaches as Peyton Manning of the Colts and Vince Young of the Titans. Manning, a classic pocket passer, will face the agile and tough Young today in Tennessee.
snippet: It is possible that there have never been quarterbacks as different in their approaches as Peyton Manning of the Colts and Vince Young of the Titans. Manning, a classic pocket passer, will face the agile and tough Young today in Tennessee.
